import React, {useState} from 'react' import './booking.css' import { Form,FormGroup, ListGroup, ListGroupItem, Button } from 'reactstrap' const Booking = ({tour, avgRating}) => { const {price, reviews} = tour const [credentials, setCredentials] = useState({ }) const handleChange = e => { } return

${price} /per person

{avgRating === 0 ? null : avgRating} ({reviews?.length})
{/* booking from */}
Information
{/* booking bottom */}
${price} 1 person
${price}
Service charge
$10
Total
$109
} export default Booking
